name: Filter & Sorter
author: Contriverz

sections.description: This plugin allow you to add filter and sorting column on the post list page and page list page in dashboard. You just need to go to setting you will find two submenus Filters and other one is sorter. You will find the customfields there selected customfields will be used and filter and sorter in respective posttype page.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload filter_sorter.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
What about Filter & Sorter?

This plugin allow you to add filter and sorting column on the post list page and page list page in dashboard.
